item.description:
Boston Area Real Estate Investors Association

Where: Hilton Garden Inn, 420 Totten Pond Rd., Waltham, MA

October 18, 2007 - Monthly Meeting

David Long of Strategic Vision

5:30 - 6:30 PM - Networking and Meet the Vendors

6:00 PM - New Member/Visitors Orientation

6:30 PM - Meeting

Why Most Small Businesses Don't Work,

and What To Do About It

Implementation of E-Myth principles in your business

People - Why they don?t always give you what you want and what to do about it.
Management - Why it doesn?t work and what to do about it. How to organize and delegate for success.
Marketing - What the simplest approach to creating a powerful market position and how to do it - immediately - no matter what your business does, no matter where you do it.
Money - Why the most important thing any small business owner can do is get his or her business ready for sale? before you?re ready to sell it!


David doesn?t just speak, he makes a difference!

David Long will help you see your business from a whole new perspective and then provide you tools to take your business to a new level.
